name: digdugz
text: You just gotta have faith, Liebot.

name: cracklewater
text:
But no-one will believe him when he tries to tell them of his true George Michael sighting.

This is the tradgedy of Liebot.

text: A comment left by asherdan was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by doinkydoink, biomusicologist, riotdejaneiro, Thorfinn, Deusoma, DiamondMonster, tttt2, kylemcjuicy, regrepnsnefpoh, Sargasm, atticusonline, aHatOfPig, cognitonaut, Zeno, profbobo, anewcede, Afkpuz, PohlHoud, genocidefish, littlefatdog, yingkaixing, blarghamagarky, Rakadin, Dallovich)

name: wehavemagnums
text: A comment left by wehavemagnums was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ted0phile, cherojack, Ariamaki)

name: wehavemagnums
text: *your

name: mnemodomi
text: Why do people chubby corrections so much?

name: pigeon_street
text: Because people deserve chubs fro righting their wrongs. It shows Decency.

name: pigeon_street
text:
*for

-looks around hopefully-

name: dusty
text: See, it's also helpful, I was wondering: "fro righting?", what does the practice of using boards and pulleys to set one's large hairdo level and plum have to do with errors in spelling?

name: alejandroadam
text:
is he holding his head with shock and joy? also that last panel you can just see him scrambling over the fence. it is sooo golden.

what is with Philippe's man on a stick?

name: centipede_damascus
text: According to the transcript, he is adjusting his eyebrows. I don't know if he can't move them himself or what.

name: zem
text: that makes it a lot funnier, I didn't notice that

name: woodenteeth
text: Phillipe's man on a stick represents George Michael killing his own career.

name: poodlelucy
text: it looks like a hanging man on a divining rod. is philippe searching for black-clad men?

name: terribleman
text: Back in small times we had a thing where we would tie a G.I.JOE action figure to a stick, then roll some rounds of toilet paper around him, then twist wire around the whole thing. We would set it on fire and it would smoke and sizzle for a long time. When unwrapped the action figure was burned almost but not quite beyond recognition. This strip reminds me! Ah, such a crumbling beauty.

name: william
text: Alt Text: I absolutely love George Michael's new performance art career.

name: caduceo
text: A comment left by caduceo was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by johnnybaverage, karljw, silver_lake, riotdejaneiro, Overmedicated, Jesler729, sevenarts, Dueledge, odei, dennycrane, trisha, equinn2006, Tagrineth, petro, atticusonline, TombsGrave, mustconcentrate, d3athcann0n, Crater12, aHatOfPig, orrrderup, Fcannon, mountain, nutmeg, TheGreatestCape, mrblank91, eRiUukFJk, smilebuddha, Doc_Rostov, ford, Dainbramage, Rawk5tar, Mastronaut, Centipede_Damascus, Dasuta)

text: It is still totally hilarious. 5.

name: zefiel
text: A comment left by zefiel was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Norsef, salo, EvilBobikus, d3athcann0n, Zem, TheGreatestCape)

name: someone3
text: all going pro ice on the comic, yo.

name: catachresis
text:
He's right about it not making any sense, though.
Give the dude that, if not his 1.

name: tagrineth
text:
Mad chubbies for the visual of Whack-a-Mole on a chess board.

Now that is what I call "Checkmate".

name: gormster
text: A comment left by gormster was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by johnnybaverage, CygnusX-1, daidai, mugi)

name: i_love_kate
text:
Yeah, it's just so idiotic of them to look at Assetbar during their first read-through of the archives.

Jackass.

name: gormster
text:
Okay so I didn't realise this comic came before that one! Fuck you! FUCK YOU THAT'S WHAT!

I
HOPE
YOU
DIE

IN A CAR CRASH


A BAD ONE

name: i_love_kate
text: WELL I HOPE YOUR MOTHER SMOTHERS YOU TO DEATH WITH HER DECREPIT VAGINA AS YOUR FATHER AND ANY SIBLINGS WATCH, HELPLESS.

name: connormc
text: jesus christ man did you have to put that image in all of our heads

name: saint
text: Good God man; what did my mind's eye ever do to you?

name: snowman
text:
why did you think of that though
why would you think of that

name: dueledge
text: damn you I accidentally chubbied your post instead of laming it, for shame.

name: pohlhoud
text: Somehow, i think anything Lie Bot says ends up true.

name: jonmw
text: If Mickey Mouse becomes president, then the world might just turn out right

name: nonanon
text: You're confused, friend: Mickey was going to off himself if Philippe didn't step down to let Bush be President. It wasn't that Mickey wanted to be President.

name: gormster
text: This does not contradict the previous statement.

name: nonanon
text:
I... I think I replied to the wrong comment?

I... may have been drunk.

name: stuart
text: Those profile shots are straight off a bottle of Paul Mitchell

name: mikebox
text: Notice the flip-flop, so excellent.

name: philosophe
text: Notice he is wearing socks.

name: bourbonsamurai
text: George Michael is so creepy. He looks like a lizard going to eat a rat or something.

name: ford
text: Something about George michaels leg is just so goddamn hilarious

name: professorhazard
text: It is panel ten, and George Michael cannot believe his good fortune.

name: hateandwar
text:
I just wanted you to know that I think of this sentence every time I think of George Michael.

"How often do you think about George Michael?"

Not often enough.

name: dueledge
text: George Michael is brillopads.

name: dasilodavi
text: Wait, so, George Michael is going to get pleasure from that hedge Lie Bot is in?  Is there something I'm supposed to get here?  Because I don't.

name: relaxing
text: Chances are, you know.

name: relaxing
text: But to be helpful, even though evidently you are old enough to remember these things, you can google "george michael" and bushes and find out more.

name: killingthejay
text: OHHH thank you

name: fosters
text:
For some reason George Michael climbing over that fence makes me think of the girl from The Exorcist crab-walking down the stairs, or the spider-head from The Thing.

Basically what I'm getting at here is I am FREAKED OUT.

name: nokococo
text: Never before has George Michael looked so scary. ;_;

name: soticoto
text: ... No... no, I'm pretty sure he always looked like that.

name: epicurus
text: God I hope Lie Bot does not need Philippe's help.

name: xiaomimi
text:
Weekend Blogs (Saturday - Monday)

Ray: Leo's service.

name: i_love_kate
text: I like how Ray uses the phrase "Stone fuck" again. Maybe he reserves it for grieving.

name: terribleman
text: Nice catch!

name: chachibenji
text: The scary man in flip flops and socks must massage his head before heading over to that bush for some bushwhackery.

name: stubob
text: Seriously, what the hell is Philippe holding?

name: molesticide
text:
it is a very tiny, limp human figure hung from a stick. i think.

this is worse than anything george michael is doing.

name: alext
text: This is one of those that will never cease to get a laugh out of me. The way the strip is drawn conveys to me this strange silence, like George Michael is some kind of sinister predator. The expresion on his face is one of malicious delight. Hilarious.

name: stereo
text: I subconsciously imitated the last panel of this strip approximately 3 months after it ran. (PG-13, contains ruuude posturing, small puppy)

name: atticusonline
text: What the hell is this? What did you do here? Why would you do that?

name: tekende
text: You just gotta have faith, Lie Bot. Just gotta have faith, faith, faith.

name: pumpinpedal
text: Is he going to fukk that shrubbery?
